title: Until Death
description: Denise Hollis, an African American business woman, suffered domestic violence for six years. When her abusive boyfriend turns his violent temper toward her child, she finally escapes. Now, living in a shelter for female victims of domestic violence and their children, Denise struggles to rebuild her life for herself and her infant son. But how long can she hide.... For Tony Santino, Denise committed three acts of betrayal – she left him; she called the police; she made him a fugitive. Enraged by Denise's disloyalty, Tony now has one goal – to find where she's hiding and remind her she belongs to him, until death!
author: Yakiri Truth
